###TODO###.description: ###TODO### example using complex definitions for repeated use

name.description: The name of the tax band.

rate.description: Tax band rate. The value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

bandLimit.description: Tax band limit. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

apportionedBandLimit.description: Apportioned tax band limit. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

income.description: Income amount. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxAmount.description: Tax amount. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
